name: In The Shoes
description:
This project was made by Aniket Chaudhry for the 2022 Games For Change Student Challenge. 

InTheShoes is an interactive, story-based game that places players "in the shoes" of a typical student facing certain difficulties in the school environment as a result of their intellectual disabilities. By the end, players will understand that these students aren't as different as they might seem.

Specific mental disabilities are not mentioned to avoid singling out people, and instead, players develop empathy for the character they play as, understanding that the other characters' perceptions of this character are unfair and unreasonable, despite the challenges the character faces throughout.

Controls:

-Cycle through text and launch objects using "MOUSE1" or the left mouse button 

-Move to the next scene/Skip segments using "SPACEBAR"

 -Look around by moving your mouse or swiping your trackpad.
